lead_paragraph: Team USA will be without many star players in Rio due mainly to concerns over Zika and injuries, but such is the depth of the country's basketball talent that they are expected to cruise to a third consecutive gold medal.

headline.print_headline: Team USA Look to Sweep Golds in Rio
headline.main: Team USA Look to Sweep Golds in Rio
